title: North Korea makes $200m by 'flouting' sanctions
text:
North Korea makes $200m by 'flouting' sanctions 4:29pm GMT - 01:47 
North Korea violated United Nations sanctions to earn nearly $200 million in 2017 from banned commodity exports, according to a confidential report by independent U.N. monitors, which also accused Pyongyang of supplying weapons to Syria and Myanmar. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
North Korea violated United Nations sanctions to earn nearly $200 million in 2017 from banned commodity exports, according to a confidential report by independent U.N. monitors, which also accused Pyongyang of supplying weapons to Syria and Myanmar.
